item.description:
We meet at least once a month, at the Holliston Meadows, 140 Summer Street, Holliston, MA 01746 (508) 429 1500. The Meadows is a beautiful multimillion dollar newly built dog resort and spa.
The area for the meetup is clean, elegant, cozy and personal, has windows, (and a treadmill!) The staff is angelic!
And there is plenty of seating.
The meet is a casual play group for our dogs and a chance to talk to each other about our dogs and enjoy refreshments. It is a lot of fun to watch our dogs play together! Check out our photos from past meets.
All small dogs that are polite with other dogs of any breed or mix are invited.
item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group
